i really no longer had the strength to wait for you... really miss you alot... i cant feel the warm you had given me before no more i really misS it... i really hurt you alot in the past and i really regret it... my heart hurts cant breath no more... cant find you no more... cant have you back... cant feel you... cant give you happiness... really hope she can give you happiness hope that she can bring all the happines which i fail to give you... i once hurt you so i wont ask much for god but as long as you are happy i will be happY... haiz... take care...=]

i always think that i had forgotten you and i'm ready to get into a new relationship but i was wrong.... you were not by my side no more which make me feel i had forgotten you but when i saw you with her, i'm force to face the fact that i had not forgotten you and you had gone far far far away... i can see you and her together very happy... i' happy for you two too... but dunno why i just feel she is toying with ur feeling and i hate her... maybe it was because i didnt treasure you in the past and now i had become so protective to you... haiz...really in a total lost... nothing seem to light up in my life... everything is black and white... onli left with one support hu i can support... but the one and only support doesnt seem stable to me.... i had already fall all the way dowm with no one else with me... all i can do is to miss you and dream of you... i really hope i can force myself to get into another relationship and forget you... but is it fair to them? no... i cant be so selfish.. plus i believe i can no longer find someone as ungerstanding as you and as caring as you and also someone who once love and treasure me so much... i really miss you and really regret... but still hope she can bring you happiness joy and the love once i fail to give you wholeheartedly...
